definition: to move about/to go from place to place/roving/mobile
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Small pelagic fish often accompanying sharks or mantas.
sentences.chinese: 经常伴随鲨鱼和蝠鲼游动的远洋小鱼。

sentences.english: They have developed the ability to move rather than just drift, jetting at up to four knots through the water.
sentences.chinese: 它们不止漂浮，还能游动，在水中喷射至四海里。

sentences.english: Class of Random Walks on Half-line in Random Environments.
sentences.chinese: 一类随机环境中半直线上的可逗留随机游动。

sentences.english: Angle at any time as fish are often swimming at the place out of your expectation.
sentences.chinese: 要随时撒下鱼钩，鱼儿常在你最料想不到的地方游动。

sentences.english: The main forms of life in the limnetic zone are phytoplankton and zooplankton.
sentences.chinese: 此区主要由浮游植物和浮游动物组成。

sentences.english: He pointed to a trout wavering in midstream.
sentences.chinese: 指着河里游动着的一条鳟鱼。

sentences.english: Goldfish are very attractive when they swim in aquariums or fish bowls .
sentences.chinese: 金鱼在水族箱或鱼缸里游动时十分漂亮。

sentences.english: They do not produce motile spores at any stage of the life cycle.
sentences.chinese: 在生活史的各阶段都不发育产生游动孢子。

sentences.english: Can the fish swim? Yes, she can.
sentences.chinese: 几条小黄鱼在水中调皮地游动。

sentences.english: The Recurrence for a Class of Non-nearest-neighbor Random Walks in Random Environments.
sentences.chinese: 一类随机环境中非紧邻的随机游动的常返性。

sentences.english: And they are in line with the direction that he is going.
sentences.chinese: 臀部与游动的方向成一条直线。

sentences.english: At the windy window, the widow finds a blind snake winding.
sentences.chinese: 在当风的窗口，孀妇发现有条盲眼蛇在游动。

sentences.english: The Recurrence of Random Walks in an Independent Random Environment on Half-Line.
sentences.chinese: 半直线上独立随机环境中的随机游动的常返性。

sentences.english: In fact, tunas must swim to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，金枪鱼必须靠游动才能呼吸。

sentences.english: Its sail-like first dorsal fin provides stability while swimming.
sentences.chinese: 帆状的第一背鳍在游动时提供了稳定性。

sentences.english: This investigation showed that Zhongshan City had abundant freshwater zooplankton species.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果表明，中山市淡水浮游动物资源比较丰富。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
to float/to hover/to drift (also fig., to lead a wandering life)/to rove/showy/superficial
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
to shake/to fling one's arm/to lash/to swing
